npcs.name: Clewan Thunderfar
utterances: Be at peace, young one.

npcs.name: a confused guard
utterances: Stay away from me!
Stay back! I don't know you...
I was here to...leave me alone!
I don't know what is happening here, leave me alone!

npcs.name: Gavin Seabreach
utterances: Sorry, this is a private matter.

npcs.name: Gelerth Bucklebrow
utterances: Ugg! What happened?
Oh, yeah... I have no idea what I am doing with this scout stuff. I was following a thief one minute, and then the next minute I get flogged on the head with a flying beer stein. Then black!
Thank you, so much.

npcs.name: a Graystone barbarian
utterances: Time to test your fighting skills!
You said what about my beard?
I will beat you to a pulp!
Get out of the way!
You will regret spilling my beer!

npcs.name: a Graystone dwarf
utterances: Get out of the way!
You will regret spilling my beer!
You said what about my beard?
I will beat you to a pulp!

npcs.name: a loyal follower
utterances: Stick around and I'll rearrange that pretty face of yours.
Marweth isn't seeing anyone right now. Scram!

npcs.name: a Supply Thief
utterances: Hey! Have you been following me!?

I'm sorry. I didn't steal things to sell or anything. I'm not sure exactly why I did it  to be honest. It was just there and no one was guarding it. Think of it as me improving the guards of our fine city by showing them our weaknesses!
Yes, I swear!

npcs.name: Tarrill Beatfist
utterances: I just hope we can end this whole business quietly.
